entry.title: Local governments have 3 days to complete cash aid for poorest Filipinos: DILG

media:group.media:title: Local governments have 3 days to complete cash aid for poorest Filipinos: DILG
media:group.media:description: Local governments should complete before this month-end the distribution of the first tranche of cash aid to help the poorest Filipinos cope with the COVID-19 pandemic, the interior department said Tuesday.

entry.title: Alkansiya, ihawan gawa ng 2 construction worker kapalit ng pagkain

media:group.media:title: Alkansiya, ihawan gawa ng 2 construction worker kapalit ng pagkain
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Alkansiya at ihawan na mula sa scrap metal ang ginawa at ipinagpapalit ng dalawang construction worker para may makain sa kabila ng lockdown na ipinatutupad sa Metro Manila at ilang lalawigan sa Pilipinas laban sa coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

entry.title: A cure for coronavirus? Military chief asks Chinese Embassy for alleged COVID-19 drug

media:group.media:title: A cure for coronavirus? Military chief asks Chinese Embassy for alleged COVID-19 drug
media:group.media:description: The head of the Philippine military has asked the Chinese Embassy in Manila for help in buying an unregistered drug from Beijing that supposedly helped him recover from COVID-19 infection.

entry.title: QC Public Library may alok na libreng online storytelling, tutorial para sa mga kabataan

media:group.media:title: QC Public Library may alok na libreng online storytelling, tutorial para sa mga kabataan
media:group.media:description: Nakaisip ang Quezon City Public Library ng pakulo para makatulong sa mga nais matuto sa gitna ng lockdown sa Kamaynilaan.

entry.title: Coast guard nagsagawa ng aerial surveillance sa dumadaung na cruise ships sa Manila Bay

media:group.media:title: Coast guard nagsagawa ng aerial surveillance sa dumadaung na cruise ships sa Manila Bay
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Nagsagawa ng aerial surveillance ang tropa ng Philippine Coast Guard sa palibot ng Manila Bay para i-monitor ang mga cruise ship na nakatakdang magbaba ng kanilang Filipino crew members.

entry.title: KILALANIN: Aspin na si Chi-Chi, COVID-19 frontliner sa Maynila

media:group.media:title: KILALANIN: Aspin na si Chi-Chi, COVID-19 frontliner sa Maynila
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Tampok ngayon sa barangay sa lungsod na ito ang isang aspin (asong-Pinoy) na tinaguriang frontliner na tumutulong para mapigilan ang pagkalat ng coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

entry.title: Waze works with local governments to fight COVID-19

media:group.media:title: Waze works with local governments to fight COVID-19
media:group.media:description: Traffic navigation app Waze said Tuesday it was working with governments of some 67 countries in their fight against the COVID-19 pandemic.

entry.title: PSE 'adjusted' to remote trading during lockdown, president says

media:group.media:title: PSE 'adjusted' to remote trading during lockdown, president says
media:group.media:description: The Philippine Stock Exchange has adjusted to “floor-less” trading and shortened hours during the lockdown, its president said Tuesday.

entry.title: Anti-bullying hotline para sa frontliners, COVID-19 patients inilunsad sa Pasay

media:group.media:title: Anti-bullying hotline para sa frontliners, COVID-19 patients inilunsad sa Pasay
media:group.media:description: Naglunsad ng anti-dsicrimination hotline ang lokal na pamahalaan ng Pasay para sa mga frontliners at COVID-19 patients.

entry.title: Doktor sa Pangasinan, nakarekober mula sa COVID-19

media:group.media:title: Doktor sa Pangasinan, nakarekober mula sa COVID-19
media:group.media:description:
URDANETA CITY, Pangasinan - Nakarekober na ang isang 33 anyos na doktor na nagpositibo sa coronavirus disease 2019 matapos mahawa sa isang pasyente.

entry.title: Duterte eyes 'modified quarantine' after Luzon lockdown | ANC

media:group.media:title: Duterte eyes 'modified quarantine' after Luzon lockdown | ANC
media:group.media:description:
President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday night said he might declare the implementation of a "modified quarantine" in parts of the country once the enhanced community quarantine ends during the COVID-19 pandemic.

entry.title: Subdivisions cannot make their own COVID-19 lockdown rules: DILG | ANC

media:group.media:title: Subdivisions cannot make their own COVID-19 lockdown rules: DILG | ANC
media:group.media:description:
Subdivisions should follow guidelines of the inter-agency task force leading the fight against COVID-19, the interior department said, following incidents of police altercation with some residents of these areas.
